unnormalised: Oh ho, cart abandonment! Like forgetting your chai at a roadside stall. Did Amrita *ji* get distracted by a Bollywood gossip column again at 11:00 AM on 26/01/2023? Rs. 599 sitting there, lonely like a biryani without raita! Come back, Amrita *ji*, before someone else grabs that *lehenga*! Don't be like that one time I forgot my Maths exam on 14/11/1995!
normalised: Oh ho, cart abandonment! Like forgetting your chai at a roadside stall. Did Amrita ji get distracted by a Bollywood gossip column again at eleven AM on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three? Rupee five hundred and ninety nine sitting there, lonely like a biryani without raita! Come back, Amrita ji, before someone else grabs that lehenga! Don't be like that one time I forgot my Maths exam on fourteenth November nineteen ninety five!
